text: Daequan Cook (born April 28, 1987) is an American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Chicago Bulls of the NBA since 2013. He played for the Oklahoma City Thunder from 2010 through 2012. Then he played for the Houston Rockets from 2012 through 2013. Cook was born on April 28, 1987 in Dayton, Ohio.NBA.com: Daequan Cook Draft 2007 Profile He studied at Paul Laurence Dunbar High School. ==References== ==Other websites== *Daequan Cook Fan Forum Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:African- American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Houston Rockets players Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio
title: Daequan Cook
